data.name: Gmail thin Compose no icons 4 labels
data.description: for a less encumbered & more compact display : no icons for labels on the left bar, thinner 'Compose' button, hide above 'Main Menu' button, margin/padding/height tweaks to gain space on top elements

data.name: Fmovies - Clean Night Mode
data.description:
Very simple night mode with a little bit of cleaning to make the site look better overall with ads hidden(use with ublock orgin extension).

*popups may still appear on click regardless of having an adblocker installed but that is due to the website/adblockers and not from this theme

data.name: Dramacool Dark Theme
data.description: Dark theme for Dramacool/Watchasain drama website.

data.name: Roblox Cheez-It logo (ACTUALLY FIXED)
data.description: Now also has dark mode support!

user.name: CraX_e621
user.about: I make styles, mostly for Roblox.

data.name: WatchSeries Dark
TerraMaster TNAS - Dark mode
data.description:
Night/Dark/Black theme for TerraMaster TNAS online. Makes the folders, top bar, and most navigation items appear in a dark mode. I created this since the default themes were all bright colored.

Designed for Firefox, but can be imported to Chrome to work with that browser - just copy the CSS and "import" to Chrome in the style settings of that browser.

NOTE - this has not been tested with new versions of Stylish. Only confirmed to be working with Stylish versions that were published prior to February 2018.

data.name: RedCafe Xenforo 2 Red Fluid
data.description: A slightly more red theme for the new Xenforo 2 version of Redcafe. Full width.

data.name: Restore Old YouTube Player
data.description:
Allows you to restore the old player (does not overlap on the sides and is not clickable).
Allows you to define the desired height of the player (default: 720p).

data.name: Kindle-like color scheme
data.description:
This replaces the garish default colors with warm sepia tones.

It's probably very fragile.
